divs: sighting detailsaround 9:10 pm my co worker miguel and i (omar) were trowing the trash outside getting ready to leave work, when we notice an object with light far in the distance, our work place is next to the fullerton airport, and we believed it was some kind of plane, but we notice that it was comming towards our direction fast and descending, my coworker believed it was some kind of paper burning but i noticed that it had a straight patern when moving forward, as it keep desending towards us i runned towards the building and miguel stayed i look back and saw the object flying over miguel's head and there was a noise like a jet sound, the object was about 30 fett tall in an hexagon shaped and had lights on front and back and it was about 8 feet wide it was flying in an standing position it look like the hexagonal ufo in the wartford city sighting in 1978 but all lights were redish\orange and it didn't leave any trails of any kind we felt scared, another thing is that it look like it kept descending but we couldn't see the landing site because of the buildings but it passed on top of the airport comming from the buena park city toward the fullerton down town side, it kept a straign motion , never moved and on the side it was dark it was like a standing hexagon flying in a descending way and it was flying in a fast speed
Summary: hexagonal shaped with light flew over coworkers head
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Fullerton
There were no other sightings in Fullerton on or around June 6th 2013
